content.query:
-- FactTable
IF NOT EXISTS (
    SELECT 1 
    FROM sys.tables t
    JOIN sys.schemas s ON t.schema_id = s.schema_id
    WHERE t.name = 'FactTable' 
      AND s.name = 'gold'
)
BEGIN
    CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE gold.FactTable
    WITH
    (
        LOCATION = 'FactTable',
        DATA_SOURCE = gold_source,
        FILE_FORMAT = parquet
    )
    AS
    SELECT 
        O.DimOrdersKey,
        C.DimCustomerKey,
        G.DimGeographyKey,
        P.DimProductKey,
        F.Quantity,
        F.UnitPrice,
        F.TotalAmount
    FROM silver.silverTable F
    LEFT JOIN gold.DimOrders O 
        ON F.OrderID = O.OrderID
    LEFT JOIN gold.DimCustomer C 
        ON F.CustomerID = C.CustomerID
    LEFT JOIN gold.DimProduct P 
        ON F.ProductID = P.ProductID
    LEFT JOIN gold.DimGeography G 
        ON F.RegionID = G.RegionID AND F.Country = G.Country;
END;

SELECT * FROM gold.FactTable;
